java/liquibase/dbdoc/PendingSQLWriter.java

00001 package liquibase.dbdoc;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 import liquibase.change.Change;
00005 import liquibase.database.Database;
00006 import liquibase.exception.MigrationFailedException;
00007 import liquibase.Liquibase;
00008 
00009 import java.io.File;
00010 import java.io.FileWriter;
00011 import java.io.IOException;
00012 import java.util.List;
00013 
00014 public class PendingSQLWriter extends HTMLWriter {
00015 
00016     public PendingSQLWriter(File rootOutputDir, Database database) {
00017         super(new File(rootOutputDir, "pending"), database);
00018     }
00019 
00020     protected String createTitle(Object object) {
00021         return "Pending SQL";
00022     }
00023 
00024     protected void writeBody(FileWriter fileWriter, Object object, List<Change> ranChanges, List<Change> changesToRun, Liquibase liquibase) throws IOException{
00025         if (changesToRun.size() == 0) {
00026             fileWriter.append("<b>NONE</b>");
00027         }
00028 
00029         fileWriter.append("<code><pre>");
00030 
00031         ChangeSet lastRunChangeSet = null;
00032 
00033         for (Change change : changesToRun) {
00034             ChangeSet thisChangeSet = change.getChangeSet();
00035             if (thisChangeSet.equals(lastRunChangeSet)) {
00036                 continue;
00037             }
00038             lastRunChangeSet = thisChangeSet;
00039             String anchor = thisChangeSet.toString(false).replaceAll("\\W","_");
00040             fileWriter.append("<a name='").append(anchor).append("'/>");
00041             try {
00042                 thisChangeSet.execute(liquibase.getDatabase());
00043             } catch (MigrationFailedException e) {
00044                 fileWriter.append("EXECUTION ERROR: ").append(change.getChangeName()).append(": ").append(e.getMessage()).append("\n\n");
00045             }
00046         }
00047         fileWriter.append("</pre></code>");
00048     }
00049 
00050     protected void writeCustomHTML(FileWriter fileWriter, Object object, List<Change> changes, Database database) throws IOException {
00051     }
00052 }
